name: Meowstic ♀
description: The Constraint Pokémon. When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: This Pokémon bypasses Light Screen, Reflect, Substitute, Mist, Safeguard, and Aurora Veil.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.description: This Pokémon adds its proficiency bonus to damage rolls while poisoned, burned, confused, or paralyzed.
